attributes.action: stop wasting any more money propping up Northern Rock some £57 Billion to date and get it back!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If as it has been suggested, that there is a possibility of Northern Rock being 'nationalised' for a short period, I presume this will mean all the money the Chancellor and the Prime Minister have pumped into Northern Rock will be 'written off' in another cavalier expression of the contempt this government has for the native population of this country.
